casebody.data:
MANNING, et al.
v.
COUNTY OF HALIFAX. No. 589PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 18, 2005. Christopher W. Jones, John W. O'Tuel, Raleigh, for The County of Halifax. James B. Blackburn, Raleigh, for Asso. County Commissioners.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of April 2005 by Plaintiff for extension of time to file brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Manning, et al.) shall have up to and including the 25th day of April 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the *30Court in conference this the 18th day of April 2005."
